sentence.Network_en: Note that these contours do not encompass the crack tip.
sentence.Network_cn: 注意这些围道,都不包含裂信尖端.

sentence.Network_en: No single document could encompass all the shades of interpretation.
sentence.Network_cn: 但任何一项文件也不可能把各种细微的解释全部包括进去.

sentence.Network_en: The course will encompass physics, chemistry and biology.
sentence.Network_cn: 课程将包括物理 、 化学和生物学.

一个更大的带有共容利益(encompassing interests)的利益集团会支持与更普遍利益而不是狭隘利益相关的政策。奥尔森的两篇文章《 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (formerly also as incompass): from en-, in- 'within' + compass

entry.def: If something encompasses particular things, it includes them.

example.ex: ...the extra services, which start next September and encompass a wide range of special interests...
example.tran: 将从明年9月开始并涵盖各种特殊需求的额外服务

example.ex: His repertoire encompassed everything from Bach to Schoenberg.
example.tran: 他能演奏从巴赫到勋伯格的所有作品。

entry.def: To encompass a place means to completely surround or cover it.

example.ex: Encompassing over a million square miles, this remote and mountainous domain presides over the rest of Asia...
example.tran: 这片偏远多山的疆土位于亚洲大陆，占地超过100万平方英里。

example.ex: The map shows the rest of the western region, encompassing nine states.
example.tran: 地图上显示了西部地区的其他部分，包括9个州。

means.word_mean: 1. include in scope; include as part of something broader; have as one's sphere or territory;

sentences.sentence: "This group encompasses a wide range of people from different backgrounds"
"this should cover everyone in the group"

auth_sentence.content: These encompass plants and animals from land and sea.
auth_sentence.res_content: These encompass plants and animals from land and sea.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These encompass plants and animals from land and sea.

auth_sentence.content: Harold seemed to me to encompass all that and more.
auth_sentence.res_content: Harold seemed to me to encompass all that and more.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Harold seemed to me to encompass all that and more.

auth_sentence.content: Over time it has grown to encompass a great deal more.
auth_sentence.res_content: Over time it has grown to encompass a great deal more.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Over time it has grown to encompass a great deal more.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =pass through,表示"步,通过"; 2. =feeling,表示"感情"; 3. = 表示"忍耐,遭受"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不能通行的,无路可通的
stems_affixes.word_buile: impasse[n.僵局,死路]+able能……的→adj.不能通行的,无路可通的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 慷慨激昂的,充满激情的
stems_affixes.word_buile: im进入+passion激情+ed有……的→有激情的
im无+pass感情+ive……的→没感情
pass感情+ive……的→感情用事→被动的
com共同+pass步,通过→共同能过的地方→做事的范围
im不+pass步,通过+e→通不过
pass步,通过→v.经过；通过；度过；传递 n.通行证；经过

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通过,经过;通路,走廊;[一]段落,[一]节
stems_affixes.word_buile: pass步,通过+age总称→n.通过,经过;通路,走廊;[一]段落,[一]节
pass步,通过+enger人→通过的人→乘客

stems_affixes.value_cn: 护照,达到某种目的的手段
stems_affixes.word_buile: pass步,通过+port港口→通过港口的凭证
com共同+passion感情→有共同的感情→同情

stems_affixes.value_cn: 热情,激情,爱好;激怒;强烈感情
stems_affixes.word_buile: pass感情+ion表名词→n.热情,激情,爱好;激怒;强烈感情
tres=trans越过+pass步,通过→横穿而过
en进入+compass范围→包围
pass步,通过→v.经过；通过；度过；传递 n.通行证；经过

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 动词前缀,通常加在名词前构成动词,表示"进入……之中,包围,成为"; 2. 动词前缀,表示"使……进入状态或加强等意思"

stems_affixes.word_buile: en进入……之中,包围,成为+dem人民+ic表形容词→在人民之中→地方性的
en进入……之中,包围,成为+cage笼子→v.关入笼中
en进入……之中,包围,成为+chain锁链→v.束缚
en进入……之中,包围,成为+roll转,倦→往里倦→注册

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给……题名, 给……称号;授权, 授权
stems_affixes.word_buile: en进入……之中,包围,成为+title标题,头衔→v. 给……题名, 给……称号;授权, 授权
en进入……之中,包围,成为+trap陷阱→v.以网或陷阱捕捉
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+purple紫→v.使成紫色 v.发紫
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+act行动→进入行动→颁布[法令]
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+chant反复说;咒语→被咒语所迷醉
en进入+compass范围→v.包围,围绕
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+courage勇气→使人进入勇气→鼓励
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+danger危险→v.使危险
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+franchise特权,公民权→给予选举权

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使忙碌, 雇佣, 预定
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+gage挑战→进入挑战→忙碌于……
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+large大→v.扩大, 放大
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+light光+en变成→给人光明→启发
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+list名单→进入名单→入伍

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使富足, 使肥沃, 装饰, 加料于, 浓缩
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+rich富的→v.使富足, 使肥沃, 装饰, 加料于, 浓缩

stems_affixes.value_cn: 包裹, 围绕, 包围;使专注
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+wrap包裹→v.包裹, 围绕, 包围;使专注
